long_description: Scarpa T4 75mm backcountry boots bridge the gap between lightweight leather boots and heavy-duty plastic boots to give you control and comfort on long tours. Pebax(R) plastic shells maintain a consistent flex in all temperatures so your boots won't feel stiff on a frigid day. Your feet will stay warm on a cold day in the insulated Cordura(R) nylon liners; Cordura fabric stands up to abrasion. Ski/walk mechanisms in back lock and release the cuffs for downhill performance and uphill comfort. Find the perfect fit with the 2 easy-lock buckles. Bellows in front offer a smooth flex. Scarpa T4 75mm backcountry boots work well with 75mm 3-pin bindings and lightweight telemark bindings (sold separately).
